Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes a private right of action for tenants alleging a failure to keep and maintain self-closing doors
Summary: Establishes a private right of action for tenants alleging a failure to keep and maintain self-closing doors; allows for a court to award compensatory damages, reasonable attorney's fees and court costs and issue an order to the owner of the building to remedy any issue with such doors.
LawCode: Amd ยง382, Exec L; add ยง27-2114-a, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a private right of action for tenants alleging a failure to keep and maintain self-closing doors
